content:
/>
II.i.2.C.2.e
.
Handling File Mail
Upload all file mail to a claims folder.
Important
:  Do
not
place file mail under control in any claims processing system.
References
:  For more information on
processing mail in the CM portal, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, 2.A.5.c
, and
establishing a claims folder, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, 1.A
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C - Mail Management
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C
